include/physicalmodels/euler2d.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002 
00003   2D Euler Equations for Inviscid, Compressible Flows
00004 
00005     
00006   d   [ rho   ]   d   [   rho*u    ]    d  [   rho*v   ]
00007   --  [ rho*u ] + --  [rho*u*u + p ] +  -- [  rho*u*v  ] = 0
00008   dt  [ rho*v ]   dx  [   rho*u*v  ]    dy [rho*v*v + p]
00009       [   e   ]       [   (e+p)*u  ]       [  (e+p)v   ]
00010 
00011   Equation of state:
00012            p         1
00013     e = -------  +   - rho * (u^2 + v^2)
00014         gamma-1      2
00015 
00016   Choices for upwinding:
00017   "roe"       Roe upwinding
00018   "rf-char"   Roe-fixed
00019   "llf-char"  Local Lax-Friedrich
00020 
00021 */
00022 
00023 #include <basic.h>
00024 
00025 #define _EULER_2D_  "euler2d"
00026 
00027 /* define ndims and nvars for this model */
00028 #undef _MODEL_NDIMS_
00029 #undef _MODEL_NVARS_
00030 #define _MODEL_NDIMS_ 2
00031 #define _MODEL_NVARS_ 4
00032 
00033 /* choices for upwinding schemes */
00034 #define _ROE_   "roe"
00035 #define _RF_    "rf-char"
00036 #define _LLF_   "llf-char"
00037 #define _SWFS_  "steger-warming"
00038 
00039 /* directions */
00040 #define _XDIR_ 0
00041 #define _YDIR_ 1
00042 
00043 
00044 #define _Euler2DGetFlowVar_(u,rho,vx,vy,e,P,p) \
00045   { \
00046     double  gamma = p->gamma, vsq; \
00047     rho = u[0]; \
00048     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00049     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00050     e   = u[3]; \
00051     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00052     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (gamma-1.0); \
00053   }
00054 
00055 #define _Euler2DSetFlux_(f,rho,vx,vy,e,P,p,dir) \
00056   { \
00057     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00058       f[0] = rho * vx; \
00059       f[1] = rho * vx * vx + P; \
00060       f[2] = rho * vx * vy; \
00061       f[3] = (e + P) * vx; \
00062     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00063       f[0] = rho * vy; \
00064       f[1] = rho * vy * vx; \
00065       f[2] = rho * vy * vy + P; \
00066       f[3] = (e + P) * vy; \
00067     } \
00068   }
00069 
00070 #define _Euler2DRoeAverage_(uavg,uL,uR,p) \
00071   { \
00072     double  rho ,vx, vy, e ,P ,H ,csq, vsq; \
00073     double  rhoL,vxL,vyL,eL,PL,HL,cLsq,vsqL; \
00074     double  rhoR,vxR,vyR,eR,PR,HR,cRsq,vsqR; \
00075     double  gamma = p->gamma; \
00076     rhoL = uL[0]; \
00077     vxL  = uL[1] / rhoL; \
00078     vyL  = uL[2] / rhoL; \
00079     eL   = uL[3]; \
00080     vsqL = (vxL*vxL) + (vyL*vyL); \
00081     PL   = (eL - 0.5*rhoL*vsqL) * (gamma-1.0); \
00082     cLsq = gamma * PL/rhoL; \
00083     HL = 0.5*(vxL*vxL+vyL*vyL) + cLsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00084     rhoR = uR[0]; \
00085     vxR  = uR[1] / rhoR; \
00086     vyR  = uR[2] / rhoR; \
00087     eR   = uR[3]; \
00088     vsqR = (vxR*vxR) + (vyR*vyR); \
00089     PR   = (eR - 0.5*rhoR*vsqR) * (gamma-1.0); \
00090     cRsq = gamma * PR/rhoR; \
00091     HR = 0.5*(vxR*vxR+vyR*vyR) + cRsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00092     double tL = sqrt(rhoL); \
00093     double tR = sqrt(rhoR); \
00094     rho = tL * tR; \
00095     vx  = (tL*vxL + tR*vxR) / (tL + tR); \
00096     vy  = (tL*vyL + tR*vyR) / (tL + tR); \
00097     H   = (tL*HL + tR*HR) / (tL + tR); \
00098     vsq = vx*vx + vy*vy; \
00099     csq = (gamma-1.0) * (H-0.5*vsq); \
00100     P   = csq * rho / gamma; \
00101     e   = P/(gamma-1.0) + 0.5*rho*vsq; \
00102     uavg[0] = rho; \
00103     uavg[1] = rho*vx; \
00104     uavg[2] = rho*vy; \
00105     uavg[3] = e; \
00106   }
00107 
00108 #define _Euler2DEigenvalues_(u,D,p,dir) \
00109   { \
00110     double  gamma = p->gamma; \
00111     double  rho,vx,vy,e,P,c,vn,vsq; \
00112     rho = u[0]; \
00113     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00114     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00115     e   = u[3]; \
00116     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00117     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (gamma-1.0); \
00118     c    = sqrt(gamma*P/rho); \
00119     if      (dir == _XDIR_) vn = vx; \
00120     else if (dir == _YDIR_) vn = vy; \
00121     else               vn = 0.0; \
00122     if (dir == _XDIR_) {\
00123       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vn-c;   D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00124       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vn+c; D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00125       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vn;     D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00126       D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vn; \
00127     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00128       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vn-c;   D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00129       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vn;   D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00130       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vn+c;   D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00131       D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vn; \
00132     }\
00133   }
00134 
00135 #define _Euler2DLeftEigenvectors_(u,L,p,dir) \
00136   { \
00137     double  ga = param->gamma, ga_minus_one=ga-1.0; \
00138     double  rho,vx,vy,e,P,a,un,ek,vsq; \
00139     double  nx = 0,ny = 0; \
00140     rho = u[0]; \
00141     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00142     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00143     e   = u[3]; \
00144     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00145     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (ga-1.0); \
00146     ek = 0.5 * (vx*vx + vy*vy); \
00147       a = sqrt(ga * P / rho); \
00148     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00149       un = vx; \
00150       nx = 1.0; \
00151         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek + a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00152         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vx - a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00153           L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vy - a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00154         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00155         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (a*a - ga_minus_one*ek) / (a*a); \
00156         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = (ga_minus_one*vx) / (a*a); \
00157         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = (ga_minus_one*vy) / (a*a); \
00158           L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = (-ga_minus_one) / (a*a); \
00159           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek - a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00160         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vx + a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00161         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vy + a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00162           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00163         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (vy - un*ny) / nx; \
00164         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ny; \
00165           L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = (ny*ny - 1.0) / nx; \
00166         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00167     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) {  \
00168       un = vy;  \
00169       ny = 1.0; \
00170         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek+a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00171           L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx - a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00172         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy - a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00173         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00174           L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (a*a-ga_minus_one*ek) / (a*a); \
00175         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ga_minus_one*vx / (a*a); \
00176         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ga_minus_one*vy / (a*a); \
00177           L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = (1.0 - ga) / (a*a); \
00178           L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek-a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00179         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx + a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00180         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy + a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00181           L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00182           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (un*nx-vx) / ny; \
00183         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = (1.0 - nx*nx) / ny; \
00184         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = - nx; \
00185           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00186     } \
00187   }
00188 
00189 #define _Euler2DRightEigenvectors_(u,R,p,dir) \
00190   { \
00191     double  ga   = param->gamma, ga_minus_one = ga-1.0; \
00192     double  rho,vx,vy,e,P,un,ek,a,h0,vsq; \
00193     double  nx = 0,ny = 0; \
00194     rho = u[0]; \
00195     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00196     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00197     e   = u[3]; \
00198     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00199     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (ga-1.0); \
00200       ek   = 0.5 * (vx*vx + vy*vy); \
00201     a    = sqrt(ga * P / rho); \
00202     h0   = a*a / ga_minus_one + ek; \
00203       if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00204         un = vx; \
00205       nx = 1.0; \
00206         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00207         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx - a*nx; \
00208         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy - a*ny; \
00209         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = h0 - a*un; \
00210         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 1.0; \
00211         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vx; \
00212         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vy; \
00213         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ek; \
00214         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00215         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vx + a*nx; \
00216         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vy + a*ny; \
00217         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = h0 + a*un; \
00218         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00219         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ny; \
00220         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = -nx; \
00221         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vx*ny - vy*nx; \
00222     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00223       un = vy; \
00224       ny = 1.0; \
00225         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00226         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx - a*nx; \
00227         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy - a*ny; \
00228         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = h0 - a*un; \
00229         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 1.0; \
00230         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vx; \
00231         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vy; \
00232         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ek; \
00233         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0; \
00234         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vx + a*nx; \
00235         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vy + a*ny; \
00236         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = h0 + a*un; \
00237         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0; \
00238         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ny; \
00239         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -nx; \
00240         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vx*ny-vy*nx; \
00241     } \
00242   }
00243 
00244 typedef struct euler2d_parameters {
00245   double  gamma;  /* Ratio of heat capacities */
00246   char    upw_choice[_MAX_STRING_SIZE_]; /* choice of upwinding */
00247 } Euler2D;
00248 
00249 int    Euler2DInitialize (void*,void*);
00250 int    Euler2DCleanup    (void*);
